alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 4:55PM CDT until July 17 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Morgan County in central Missouri... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stover, or 12 miles northwest of Versailles, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Versailles, Stover and Florence. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
